```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
```


<div id="example" class="storyboard-nav">

<!-- prev and next buttons -->
<button class="prev"><i class="fa fa-angle-left"></i></button>
<button class="next"><i class="fa fa-angle-right"></i></button>

<!-- storyboard frame -->
<div class="frame">
<ul>
<li>This is the first page. Let's see what happens when it overflows.</li><li>2</li><li>3</li>
<li>4</li><li>5</li><li>6</li><li>7</li><li>8</li><li>9</li>

</ul>
</div>

</div>



```{js}
var $example = $('#example');
var $frame = $example.find('.frame');
var sly = new Sly($frame, {
		horizontal: true,
		itemNav: 'basic',
		smart: true,
		activateOn: 'click',
		startAt: 0,
		scrollBar: $example.find('.scrollbar'),
		scrollBy: 1,
		pagesBar: $example.find('.pages'),
		activatePageOn: 'click',
		speed: 200,
		moveBy: 600,
		dragHandle: true,
		dynamicHandle: true,
		clickBar: true,
		keyboardNavBy: 'items',

		// Buttons
		next: $example.find('.next'),
		prev: $example.find('.prev')
	}).init();
```
